oai_dc:dc.dc:title: List of absentees Co. C, 27th Ala. Inf. Rgt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a handwritten list of absentees. Some of the men are listed as being detached as pioneers, wagoners, on scouting duty, at headquarters of Gen. Buford, sick, in hospital, wounded, or deserted. Of those soldiers listed, the majority are listed as; deserted in Lauderdale County, Alabama. The 27th Alabama was recruited in Lauderdale and the surrounding counties.
